issue.title: [Go][Parquet] Add Metadata Package
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-13646](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-13646). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
The next chunk of code for the native Go implementation of Parquet: the metadata package which includes all of the types and functionality for handling Parquet metadata and statistics.

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-13646?focusedCommentId=17414238) by Matthew Topol (zeroshade):*
Issue resolved by pull request 10951
